017package de.learnlib.cache.dfa;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import javax.annotation.ParametersAreNonnullByDefault;
024
025import net.automatalib.incremental.dfa.Acceptance;
026import net.automatalib.incremental.dfa.IncrementalDFABuilder;
027import net.automatalib.incremental.dfa.dag.IncrementalDFADAGBuilder;
028import net.automatalib.incremental.dfa.tree.IncrementalDFATreeBuilder;
029import net.automatalib.words.Alphabet;
030import de.learnlib.api.MembershipOracle;
031import de.learnlib.api.Query;
032import de.learnlib.cache.LearningCacheOracle.DFALearningCacheOracle;
033
034
035/**
036 * DFA cache. This cache is implemented as a membership oracle: upon construction, it is
037 * provided with a delegate oracle. Queries that can be answered from the cache are answered
038 * directly, others are forwarded to the delegate oracle. When the delegate oracle has finished
039 * processing these remaining queries, the results are incorporated into the cache.
040 * 
041 * @author Malte Isberner <malte.isberner@gmail.com>
042 *
043 * @param <I> input symbol class
044 */
045@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
046public class DFACacheOracle<I> implements DFALearningCacheOracle<I> {
047        
048        
049        public static <I>
050        DFACacheOracle<I> createTreeCacheOracle(Alphabet<I> alphabet, MembershipOracle<I,Boolean> delegate) {
051                return new DFACacheOracle<>(new IncrementalDFADAGBuilder<>(alphabet), delegate);
052        }
053        
054        public static <I>
055        DFACacheOracle<I> createDAGCacheOracle(Alphabet<I> alphabet, MembershipOracle<I,Boolean> delegate) {
056                return new DFACacheOracle<>(new IncrementalDFATreeBuilder<>(alphabet), delegate);
057        }
058        
059        private final IncrementalDFABuilder<I> incDfa;
060        private final MembershipOracle<I,Boolean> delegate;
061
062        /**
063         * Constructor.
064         * @param alphabet the alphabet of the cache
065         * @param delegate the delegate oracle
066         * @deprecated since 2014-01-24. Use {@link DFACaches#createCache(Alphabet, MembershipOracle)}
067         */
068        @Deprecated
069        public DFACacheOracle(Alphabet<I> alphabet, MembershipOracle<I,Boolean> delegate) {
070                this(new IncrementalDFADAGBuilder<>(alphabet), delegate);
071        }
072        
073        private DFACacheOracle(IncrementalDFABuilder<I> incDfa, MembershipOracle<I,Boolean> delegate) {
074                this.incDfa = incDfa;
075                this.delegate = delegate;
076        }
077        
078        /**
079         * Creates an equivalence oracle that checks an hypothesis for consistency with the
080         * contents of this cache. Note that the returned oracle is backed by the cache data structure,
081         * i.e., it is sufficient to call this method once after creation of the cache.
082         * @return the cache consistency test backed by the contents of this cache.
083         */
084        @Override
085        public DFACacheConsistencyTest<I> createCacheConsistencyTest() {
086                return new DFACacheConsistencyTest<>(incDfa);
087        }
088        
089        /*
090         * (non-Javadoc)
091         * @see de.learnlib.api.MembershipOracle#processQueries(java.util.Collection)
092         */
093        @Override
094        public void processQueries(Collection<? extends Query<I, Boolean>> queries) {
095                List<ProxyQuery<I>> unanswered = new ArrayList<>();
096                
097                for(Query<I,Boolean> q : queries) {
098                        Acceptance acc = incDfa.lookup(q.getInput());
099                        if(acc != Acceptance.DONT_KNOW)
100                                q.answer((acc == Acceptance.TRUE) ? true : false);
101                        else
102                                unanswered.add(new ProxyQuery<>(q));
103                }
104                
105                delegate.processQueries(unanswered);
106                
107                for(ProxyQuery<I> q : unanswered)
108                        incDfa.insert(q.getInput(), q.getAnswer());
109        }
110
111}
